metadata.title: CVE-2023-39351 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP),released under the Apache license. Affected versions of FreeRDP are subjectto a Null Pointer Dereference leading a crash in the RemoteFX (rfx)handling. Inside the `rfx_process_message_tileset` function, the programallocates tiles using `rfx_allocate_tiles` for the number of numTiles. Ifthe initialization process of tiles is not completed for various reasons,tiles will have a NULL pointer. Which may be accessed in further processingand would cause a program crash. This issue has been addressed in versions2.11.0 and 3.0.0-beta3. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no knownworkarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: freerdp2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
